cab.content:
From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,
16th March 1918.
(Received at India Office 5 p.m.)
3458. Situation in Baluchistan unchanged. In No. 3318 of 13th for Chowatta, read Bowatta, between Fort Munro and Rakhni. On 13th aeroplanes bombed enemy concentration Rakhni and Bowatta. Dera Ghazi Khan force expected to reach Rakhni on 19th.
